title: Mohameek
description: SaaS platform with an admin portal and dashboard, enabling businesses to manage operations and track data efficiently.

title: OBH
description: ERP system for law firms with mobile apps, a website, and an admin portal to improve legal service efficiency.

title: LMS Platform
description: Learning platform with authentication, course enrollment, wallet payments, and certificate generation.

title: Ejad App
description: School management platform with features like school profile management, photo albums, material downloads tracking, and aggregation-based search. Implemented JWT authentication, role-based access, and file uploads for a seamless experience.

title: Task Management System (Express)
description: Task management system with JWT authentication, role-based access, task history tracking, and audit logs.

title: Task Management System (NestJS)
description: Advanced task management system built with NestJS, featuring role-based access control, audit logging, and scalable architecture.

title: Ecommerce App (Express)
description: Ecommerce backend with product management, authentication, shopping cart, and order processing APIs.
